Name: Lotus Espresso
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Garnish with 3 coffee beans arranged in a petal formation in the centre of the cocktail's foamy head.
Review: Coffee to the fore but with complex, earthy bittersweet notes.
History: Adapted from a recipe discovered in 2005 at Lotus Bar in Sydney, Australia. See: Espresso Martini story .
Nutrition: One serving of Lotus Espresso contains 216 calories
